snippet.title: My take on the classic Asteroids arcade/video game - Shoot The Rocks
snippet.description:
There are probably about a million clones of Atari's Asteroids arcade game out there for every computer and video games platform ever made. In fact it would probably be difficult to find a platform that doesn't have a version of Asteroids. Well, here's my version for the web, built with HTML5, JavaScript, and CSS. You can play it on desktop, mobile, and tablet.

TO PLAY VISIT: https://arcade.ly/games/asteroids/

Check out https://arcade.ly/ for other games, and my blog (focussed on web performance, development, and gaming) at https://arcade.ly/blog/.

The game is still very much in beta, with a few features missing. Notably the flying saucers don't yet shoot back at you (and don't make any attempt to avoid collisions with asteroids), there aren't yet any satellites (originally found in Asteroids Deluxe), and there isn't a working hiscore table. Still, it's perfectly playable so I hope you have fun with it.

Btw, I haven't tried it on any of the more recent console browsers but there's a chance (once I've added decent game controller support) it might work.

Website: https://arcade.ly/
Blog: https://arcade.ly/blog/
My site: http://www.bartread.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/arcadelygames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/arcade_ly
Google+: https://plus.google.com/111622300655975306955
